entry.title: shohey1226/Graph-Algorithm-HITS
entry.summary:
NAME

Graph::Algorithm::HITS - Anothor HITS algorithm implementation loading Graph

SYNOPSIS

use Graph::Algorithm::HITS;
use Graph;
my $g = new Graph();
$g->add_vertices(...);
$g->add_edges(...);
# Graph object as input
my $hits = Graph::Algorithm::HITS(graph => $g);
$hits->iterate(20); 
# $auth_vector = { v1 => $auth_score_v1, v2 => $auth_score_v2,,, }
my $auth_vector = $hits->get_authority();
# $hub_vector = { $v1 => $hub_score_v1, v2 => $hub_score_v2,,, }
my $hub_vector = $hits->get_hub();

DESCRIPTION

Graph::Algorithm::HITS implements HITS algorithm (see http://www2002.org/CDROM/refereed/643/node1.html). There are a couple of HITS algorithm implementations in CPAN though, the reason you would choose this is that the score can be calculated by simply loading from Graph object.

AUTHOR

Shohei Kameda shoheik@cpan.org
